scripts.say: What happened...
What’s happening... I obviously hit the biggest ship...
All Sirens on sight have been destroyed. Helena, did you find anything?
Enemy signals on the SG radar were completely gone.
No, there's someone still watching us.
Hey, you there! No more hiding, show yourself! My main guns has locked you location! Come and join me in a proper battle!
No one can escape my MK3 radar. All guns, prepare to open fire ——
Wait!
The signal sent by this unit is consistent with the previous encrypted messages, but...
(The SG radar is completely unable to locate the unit… could it be malfunctioning?)
What the heck, so it turns out that you are the “Mystery Man”, such a sneaky appearance. You could’ve easily been injured by friendly fire.
So, we are Eagle Union’s 16th Task Force, we received the mysterious signal from you and came to investigate—— Please identify yourself.
I just want to confirm something with you.
You dare to ignore my question?
Tell me... the name of your Commander...
Before confirming your identity, we have no obligation to answering your question. And what you asked is the highest of secrets.
...is that so (turns around)... then I will confirm it myself.
This Siren base was destroyed by you alone? …Who are you...
(Wait... this cloak?... How's that possible?)
E-Enterprise!
No... you’re mistaken.

sequence: <size=51>“But, our small bodies are filled with infinite expectations and ideals.”</size>
<size=51>“We often put our own expectations and ideals and shape them to our desires, hoping they are eternal and powerful.”</size>
<size=51>“Once strong enough, they will replace our  ephemeral physical existence, and become an infinite spiritual sustenance.”</size>
<size=51>“This is also the meaning to your name”</size>
<size=51>“But... one day, if mankind abandons our highest ideals, and embarks on a completely contrary path.”</size>
<size=51>... To help us correct the wrongdoings of the future?”</size>
